attributes.action: Stop enforcement of COVID-19 vaccination it shouldn’t be mandatory for a job
attributes.additional_details: It’s against my human rights to be forced to have a vaccine for a job, it’s against my ethical rights, why should I have the vaccination when this was created by us human beings not looking after the planet? COVID is a zoonotic transmissible disease. Why can’t we use herd immunity? Clinical trials for non vaccinated people, routine enforced testing.
attributes.background:
Clinical trials for non vaccinated people
Offer disclaimers for non vaccinated people
Allow people to keep weekly testing rather than take the vaccine 
Think about herd immunity

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about people being required to be vaccinated against Covid-19 in order to do certain jobs, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Prohibit employers from requiring staff to be vaccinated against Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599841

Do not require a Covid passport for access to any services, jobs or events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593122

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004

Do not make COVID vaccination a requirement for health and social care workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600872
